column4: Do I need to follow any specific boilerplate for developing apps for ubuntu using pygtk?
What do you mean by boilerplate ?
I meant any specific template? like the project skeleton
I've written a large app in pygtk.  I'm sure there are many conventions I didn't follow.  :P  You can see how I did it here: https://github.com/edbian/Mint-Berry-Crunch
